item.title: Ex-Irrational Devs (Bioshock) Announce The Black Glove
item.dc:creator: Lemonz_amp_amp_orang
item.description:
Maxey:

They don’t own the Bioshock IP tho.

edited my comment; but its more than guaranteed that there will be some system shock influences all over

people just cant get enough of the “shocks”

Read full topic
